bodyPatterns.equalToJson:
{
  "model" : "orca-mini",
  "messages" : [ {
    "role" : "user",
    "content" : "Describe the Miles of Camels Car Rental cancellations policy for cancelling 24 hours before pickup. What is the refund amount?

Answer using the following information:
CANCELLATION POLICY
- Cancellations made 24 hours before pickup: Full refund
- Cancellations made 12-24 hours before pickup: 50% refund
- Cancellations made less than 12 hours before pickup: No refund

Miles of Camels Car Rental - Company Information

BUSINESS HOURS:
Monday-Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

RENTAL AGREEMENT
- This agreement is between Miles of Camels Car Rental ("Company") and the customer ("Renter").

VEHICLE RETURN
- Vehicles must be returned with the same fuel level as at pickup.
- Late returns incur a fee of $25 per hour or fraction thereof.

DAMAGE POLICY
- Minor damages under $200: Covered by insurance
- Major damages over $200: Customer responsibility"
  } ],
  "options" : {
    "temperature" : 0.3,
    "stop" : [ ]
  },
  "stream" : false,
  "tools" : [ ]
}

response.body:
{"model":"orca-mini","created_at":"2025-09-05T08:40:13.2085886Z","message":{"role":"assistant","content":" Miles of Camels Car Rental cancellations policy for cancelling 24 hours before pickup is as follows:

CANCELLATION POLICY
- Cancellations made 24 hours before pickup: Full refund
- Cancellations made 12-24 hours before pickup: 50% refund
- Cancellations made less than 12 hours before pickup: No refund

Therefore, if you cancel your rental 24 hours or more before pickup, you will receive a full refund. If you cancel between 12 and 24 hours before pickup, you will receive 50% of the rental price as a refund. And if you cancel less than 12 hours before pickup, you will not receive a refund."},"done_reason":"stop","done":true,"total_duration":13902262172,"load_duration":1800867371,"prompt_eval_count":314,"prompt_eval_duration":3576166224,"eval_count":162,"eval_duration":8523443618}
